com.actinarium.rhythm.layer

Class DimensionsLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.actinarium.rhythm.layer.DimensionsLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RhythmSpecLayer

    public class DimensionsLabel
extends java.lang.Object
implements RhythmSpecLayer
    A layer that draws a small box with dimensions of the current view. Inspect the dimensions of your views at glance. noticing the issues asap. By default, the box is placed in the bottom right corner, but you can change its gravity with setGravity(int). Experimental at the moment, meaning its behavior, appearance, and parameters may change.

      Nested Classes

      static class  DimensionsLabel.Factory
      A default factory that creates new DimensionsLabel layers from config lines according to the docs

    • Method Detail

      • setScaleFactor

        public DimensionsLabel setScaleFactor(float scaleFactor)
        Set a scale factor that will be applied to width and height of provided bounds
        Parameters:
        scaleFactor - Scale factor to divide pixels by. Provide DisplayMetrics.density here to display dimensions as dips, DisplayMetrics.scaledDensity to display them as sp, or DEFAULT_SCALE_FACTOR (1f) to get pixels.
        Returns:
        this for chaining

      • setGravity

        public DimensionsLabel setGravity(int gravity)
        Set label gravity. Default is bottom right.
        Parameters:
        gravity - Desired gravity. Can be combinations, e.g. Gravity.BOTTOM | Gravity.LEFT
        Returns:
        this for chaining

      • setBackgroundColor

        public DimensionsLabel setBackgroundColor(int color)
        Set label background color
        Parameters:
        color - Label background color, in #AARRGGBB format as usual
        Returns:
        this for chaining

        public DimensionsLabel setTextColor(int color)
        Set the color of the label text itself
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this for chaining

      • setTextSize

        public DimensionsLabel setTextSize(float size)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • draw

        public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                 android.graphics.Rect drawableBounds)
        Description copied from interface: RhythmSpecLayer
        Draw itself to the provided canvas within provided bounds according to internal configuration (if any)
        Specified by:
        draw in interface RhythmSpecLayer
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas for the layer to draw itself to
        drawableBounds - Bounds where this layer should draw itself. Since these are the bounds of a RhythmDrawable connected to the view, they are usually the same as the view’s bounds, so you can use this parameter to get the view’s dimensions should you need them.

      • prettyPrintDips

        public static java.lang.String prettyPrintDips(int px,
                                               float scaleFactor)
        Sophisticated conversion of pixels to dips with the use of vulgar fractions (to save screen space)
        Parameters:
        px - Pixels to convert to dips
        scaleFactor - Scale factor, should be equal to DisplayMetrics.density for px to dp conversion
        Returns:
        String formatted with vulgar fraction if needed and possible
